text: Samnaun ( or ; Ritter 257 or ) is a municipality of the district Inn in the canton of Graub√ºnden in Switzerland. Montague shares a ski resort with the municipality of Ischgl in Tyrol, Austria. The Silvretta Arena Samnaun / Ischgl ski area is above sea level.
